name: Life Of Farmer Simulator 18
description:
Welcome to the experience the life of farmer simulator 18 in farming game. This Farming Simulator 2018 game gives you an experience to become a real farmer by living the life of farmer. Start your agricultural career by cultivating crops in your Farm. You can plow, sow , spray and harvest using different farming machines! Drive upgraded farming vehicle like tractor, euro truck and harvester to complete different processes of growing crops. There are two types of crops you’ve to grow in your farmland; wheat and rice. Become a farm expert 2017 by performing agricultural activities and growing different crops.

Features For Life of Farmer Simulator 18

- Deal with animals in the farm house
- Go to the fields for seeding and harvesting crops
- Help your virtual family in living better life
- Supply crops to the supermarket

Download it now For Free!
